nodes.text: Initiation was a RPG scenario written by Robert Wiese. It was released by the RPGA in August, 1998 at the Gen Con 1998 Game Fair.
Gaming sessions were run on Thursday, Friday and Saturday of the convention.

The pirates have proven too much for the standard Alliance forces, stretched thin as they are. Your team is called to infiltrate their base, capture the leaders, cripple the base, steal a ship, and get out. Why did Major Pydd pick this one to saddle you with a new guy?
